com.locuslabs.sdk.maps.view

Class MapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ConstraintLayout
      • com.locuslabs.sdk.maps.view.MapView

  • public class MapView
extends ConstraintLayout
    A view to show a Venue's Map

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MapView.ExtraButtonsForPoiPopupHandler
      A optional handler associated with a MapView.
      static interface  MapView.MenuButtonHandler
      A optional handler associated with a MapView.
      static class  MapView.Mode 
      static interface  MapView.OnCenterPositionChangedListener
      Listener which will be called whenever the center position of a MapView changed
      static interface  MapView.OnClickAtPositionListener
      Listener which will be called when the user has clicked on the Map--but not on a POI.
      static interface  MapView.OnClickPoiListener
      Listener which will be called when the user has clicked on a POI on the Map
      static interface  MapView.OnExtraButtonForPoiPopupClickedListener
      Listener which will be called whenever the user clicks on an "extra" POI button in the POI popup see setExtraButtonsForPoiPopupHandler for more information
      static interface  MapView.OnHeadingChangedListener 
      static interface  MapView.OnMenuButtonClickedListener
      Listener which will be called whenever the user clicks on an "additional" POI button in the POI popup see setMenuButtonHandler for more information
      static interface  MapView.OnModeChangedListener
      Listener which will be called once the view had changed to show a different overlay.
      static interface  MapView.OnPoiPhoneClickedListener
      Listener which will be called whenever the user clicks on an Point of Interest's phone number.
      static interface  MapView.OnPoiUrlClickedListener
      Listener which will be called whenever the user clicks on an POI URL address in the POI view
      static interface  MapView.OnRadiusChangedListener
      Listener which will be called whenever the radius of a MapView changed
      static interface  MapView.OnReadyListener
      Listener which will be called once the map view has been fully loaded and is ready for additional actions
      static interface  MapView.OnSessionIdListener
      Listener which will be called when the sessionId is available after mapView.getSessionId() has been called.
      static interface  MapView.OnSupplyCurrentActivityListener 
      class  MapView.WrappedString

      • setTheme

        public void setTheme(Theme theme)
        Set the MapView's Theme. Changes to the MapView's Theme will propagate visual changes to the application's entire presentation layer.
        Parameters:
        theme - a Theme created by the ThemeBuilder
        Since:
        1.2.5
        See Also:
        ThemeBuilder

      • themeBuilder

        public ThemeBuilder themeBuilder()
        TODO: Approve setTheme(Context,String) API for Public release. // public void setTheme(Context context, String file){ controller.setTheme(context,file); } Set the MapView's Theme. Changes to the MapView's Theme will propagate visual changes to the application's entire presentation layer. Uses the Application context and file path to to the theme file to determine which application asset contains theme information. /@param context a Context of the Application which will be used to retrieve the theme file asset. /@param file an interpreted String which points to a JSON file in the application's asset directory to the theme file which should be interpreted. /@see ThemeBuilder /@since 1.2.X

      • showPoiPopup

        public void showPoiPopup(java.lang.String poiId)
        Pans and zooms the map to center on the given poi, switching floors if needed, then displays the POI info window for this POI.
        Parameters:
        poiId - the id of the POI to show

      • closePoiPopup

        public void closePoiPopup()
        Closes the poiPopup window.

      • onBackPressed

        public boolean onBackPressed()
        Call this function when the hardware back button is pressed. It will preform the appropriate change to the MapView GUI. For example, it will close the POI Popup window if it is open. The function returns true if the GUI was modified, false if there was no applicable action to take on the MapView GUI. Example usage: public void onBackPressed() { if (mapView == null || !mapView.onBackPressed()) { super.onBackPressed(); } }
        Returns:

      • getSessionId

        public void getSessionId(MapView.OnSessionIdListener onSessionIdListener)
        The LocusLabs SDK’s track an internal "session id" (a cryptographically correct UUID) to track user activity while using our maps. A session is created as part of loading a map. When a user does something “interesting” on a map (move, view a POI, etc) the app sends data to our analytics database associated with the session id. Call this method on the MapView returned by VenueDatabase.OnLoadCompletedListener.onLoadCompleted(Venue, Map, MapView, Floor, Marker)
        Parameters:
        onSessionIdListener - the callback that will receive the sessionId when it's available
